main.name: Alvaro Alvarez
main.description: Full Stack with knowledge in Ruby for the backend and for the React frontend
main.bio: My name is Alvaro, I'm a Full Stack RoR Developer. Currently I'm learning more about React withClever Programmer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: Systems engineer, with two years of experience in software development, knowledge in API creation with ruby ​​on rails, version management with GIT using Agiles methodologies such as Scrum, supported with tools such as JIRA. Experiment in TDD with Rspec for unit tests and Cucumber for regressive tests. Event management, services and workers, asynchronous communication using AMPQ with RabbitMQ. In database I have knowledge in PostgresQL, MySql, MongoDb and Redis for cache management.

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: MERN Stack TikTok Clone
projects.category: TikTok Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
